channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Birthdays Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Birthdays Widget

item.title: CVE-2022-1643|2024-08-03T00:10:03.791Z -- unknown -- birthdays%20widget
item.description: The Birthdays Widget WordPress plugin through 1.7.18 does not sanitise and escape some of its fields, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
